AD_BasementRestrictedArea.synopsis: Plaque in front of the srocerous basements trapped rooms

AD_BasementRestrictedArea_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_BasementRestrictedArea_0.text: *No entry to vaults! Trespassers will be disintegrated! - Master Lorroakan.*

AD_MytsrylVaultUnlockPlaque_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_MytsrylVaultUnlockPlaque_0.text: *Unlock hereby the path to the Karsus Vault.*

AD_StorageAndSotring_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_StorageAndSotring_0.text: *Storage and sorting of scrollwork, parchment, and tomes.*

AD_MytsraVaultUnlockPlaque_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_MytsraVaultUnlockPlaque_0.text: *Unlock hereby the path to the Elminster Vault.*
